No More Narrow Networks Act of 2020
No More Narrow Networks Act of 2020
To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to require Exchanges to establish network adequacy standards for qualified health plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: No More Narrow Networks Act of 2020 This bill directs the Department of Health and Human Services to establish quantitative network adequacy standards for health insurance plans offered through health insurance exchanges.
